MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL57 postcode area of Bangor, affecting properties in Treflan, Glanrafon and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:13pm. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 1:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:56pm on 25th April 2021
